Welcome to ATOMiCS’s documentation!¶

Hi, this is ATOMiCS 0.1 (automated topology optimization in OpenMDAO using FEniCS). It is an open-source density-based topology optimization toolbox. ATOMiCS is built on top of the OpenMDAO framework, which is described and documented here. The solution approach to the PDE problems and the partial derivative computations are wrapped from FEniCS Project documented here. The details of ATOmiCS can be found in the following article:

@article{yan2022topology,
title={Topology optimization with automated derivative computation for multidisciplinary design problems},
author={Yan, Jiayao and Xiang, Ru and Kamensky, David and Tolley, Michael T and Hwang, John T},
journal={Structural and Multidisciplinary Optimization},
volume={65},
number={5},
pages={1--20},
year={2022},
publisher={Springer}
}

A preprint of the above article can be found here.
